name: Ferreira's fish-eating rat
description: Ferreira's fish-eating rat is a species of rodent in the family Cricetidae. It is known only from primary lowland tropical rainforest. It is named after 18th-century Brazilian naturalist Alexandre Rodrigues Ferreira. This species was originally assigned to the genus Neusticomys, but it has been moved to Daptomys along with four other species.
